task.summary: Added parallax demo. This can lead to a parallax background Entity class.

Overridded some ``pygame`` classes, implemented in ``pie._pygame``. This is to facilitate blitting to an "area" and setting flags in Group draw calls. Unfortunately we have to raw copy pygame code in this case.
Refactor much of the ``entity`` module, making it more mixin classes than inheritance heirarchy. Updated higher entities to work with this model. Tests are not updated. :( Added ``ParallaxBackground`` class to render entities using a parallax formula.
Updated bg_parallax demo to use Engine.

Added pie.math.project_3d algorithm. Set up BackgroundParallax to use new 3d projection. Added ``parallax_distance`` attribute to MRect based Entities.
Added py2exe testing. (Works well)
Update pie_bg_parallax demo
Prepare for pymunk integration. Tested load time on large animations (360 frame) with transport and it's acceptible for runtime, but perhaps not development.

Various additional `background` entities. Some not fully fleshed out, but some working decently. Starting to mess around with surfarrays, but the process of blitting them is agonizingly slow. Add `visible` attribute to `MSprite` and blit based on `visible`.

MESSAGE.value: Added parallax demo. This can lead to a parallax background Entity class.

Overridded some ``pygame`` classes, implemented in ``pie._pygame``. This is to facilitate blitting to an "area" and setting flags in Group draw calls. Unfortunately we have to raw copy pygame code in this case.
Refactor much of the ``entity`` module, making it more mixin classes than inheritance heirarchy. Updated higher entities to work with this model. Tests are not updated. :( Added ``ParallaxBackground`` class to render entities using a parallax formula.
Updated bg_parallax demo to use Engine.

Added pie.math.project_3d algorithm. Set up BackgroundParallax to use new 3d projection. Added ``parallax_distance`` attribute to MRect based Entities.
Added py2exe testing. (Works well)
Update pie_bg_parallax demo
Prepare for pymunk integration. Tested load time on large animations (360 frame) with transport and it's acceptible for runtime, but perhaps not development.

Various additional `background` entities. Some not fully fleshed out, but some working decently. Starting to mess around with surfarrays, but the process of blitting them is agonizingly slow. Add `visible` attribute to `MSprite` and blit based on `visible`.
